description.ko: 결정체 매질을 통과하는 빛이 찬란한 색채의 스펙트럼과 복잡한 기하학적 패턴으로 흩어지며 시각적 인식을 재정의하는 과정을 탐구합니다.
description.en: An exploration of light as it passes through a crystalline medium, shattering into a spectrum of vibrant colors and intricate geometric patterns that redefine visual perception.

prompt: Cinematic macro shot of a triangular glass prism refracting a sharp beam of white light into a vivid rainbow spectrum, caustic light patterns on a minimalist surface, high-speed photography, ethereal glow, dark background, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic glass textures, chromatic aberration details.
